name: Pig Rocket - DEMO
description:
Feeling bored? Well... this game is for you then. You play as a farting pig, trying to get through obstacles. There are a few levels you can play on. Enjoy!

CONTROLS: 

Space - Fly

A,D - Rotate

Pig Rocket is a prototype at the moment, so if you found any bugs, please post them down there in the comments. Feedback would be appreciated as well :)
